item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

the elve age:

Runescape population is still increasingly high from just a few months ago. With summer approaching in the next few months, it’s more likely even more kids will be playing Runescape. JMO

More playing but less newcomers, school spreads the word not staying home and playing

Read full topic

item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Agree with Frell. Minimal long term impact. I’m honestly just expecting the price of yews to drop. Hopefully I can get 99 fletching a lot cheaper from this.

item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Terrible in the long run. F2P was just released so of course the hype would bring in many players. It’ll die off soon and then you’re left with long term players

To maintain 45k or so we would need a 60k spike this weekend

Read full topic

item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:550118”]There are lots of bots though. I was on OSRS free to play worlds to get some data for the official server, and saw them myself. There probably are a lot of new players as well, but there are definitely a lot of bots too. They don’t really care about being banned, they have scripts to just create new accounts and dump the items whenever they can.[/quote]I didn’t mean to say there aren’t any bots at all. What you said is true and valid, but the botting scene isn’t nearly as bad as it has been in the past. The difference now is that players can bot to around 70 wcing but if you try to bot those long xp levels past 70 (give or take) (100k till level), the bot detection system will detect you botting those long hours. So you have a bunch of low level bots botting low level things.

Also David, check out my reply to your Grand Exchange voters comment.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There are lots of bots though. I was on OSRS free to play worlds to get some data for the official server, and saw them myself. There probably are a lot of new players as well, but there are definitely a lot of bots too. They don’t really care about being banned, they have scripts to just create new accounts and dump the items whenever they can.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P Runescape a huge success!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:550118”]Lots of bots.[/quote]Not true. Their bot detection is spot on. All new accounts/accounts w/o quests get banned within days of botting. As a veteran member, you can’t bot for more than a week w/o getting banned. Unless you’re writing/buying flawless scripts, but for the most part the bot clients suck.

Out of experience, theres a lot of new players playing. I haven’t seen world 302/330 both full in months.

Read full topic
